topSectionSubTitle: Here you can easily book the best move cleaning, our cleaners are hand-picked based on their availability, affordability and customer reviews.
RecommendedText: They offer really affordable moving cleaning and have excellent customer ratings.
RecommendedTextFlyttsmart_1: We can help you with cleaning on the selected date.
moveSummaryHeadLine: All prices are presented after: RUT-deduction
providerTitle: Available cleaning firms in {{city}} selected date:
enterAddress: Enter your address to display available cleaning companies
cleanignDatePopupText: Choose a day when your home is completely emptied of furniture and moving boxes, preferably close to when the new owners move in. Good to know: Cleaning companies often have an extra charge on weekends and public holidays.
addResidenceSizeToSeePrice: add living area to show price
dateIsWithinSevenDaysText: We will do our utmost to get you help on the desired day - if it still doesn't work, we will of course help you find another solution!
sevenDayErrorContent: To ensure we can deliver the quality you deserve, we need a little more time to coordinate with our cleaning partners.
sevenDayErrorHelpText: We'll help you find a solution that fits your moving date and needs.

MOVESUMMARY.question1: Do you have any special requests or questions about cleaning?
MOVESUMMARY.answer1: We’re here to make your move as smooth as possible. Ask us anything related to your move – from planing, to move cleaning and transport. Our team of experts are ready to assist, completely free of charge!
MOVESUMMARY.question2: VWhat’s included in the move cleaning?
MOVESUMMARY.answer2: All our cleaning firms follow the real estate association's recommendations for move cleaning. A list of all steps can be found here:
MOVESUMMARY.answer2LinkText: What is included in move cleaning?
MOVESUMMARY.question3: Why do you recommend these cleaning firms?
MOVESUMMARY.answer3: At Flyttsmart, we only collaborate with hand-picked service providers that we, through thorough checks and follow-ups, can ensure meet our high expectations. We quality-assure all our partners, thereby ensuring a smooth and reliable experience. When you book move cleaning from us, we can therefor assure that they:
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem1: Carry ut the cleaning for the right price and under fair conditions, so you get what you expect without any hidden costs.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem2: Offer a quality guarantee to ensure that the cleaning leaves your home spotless. If, by any chance there is something that does not meet your expectations, we will make sure that the issue is resolved.
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem3: Offer tax deduction services and handle everything related to it
MOVESUMMARY.answer3ListItem4: Have a history of high ratings and positive reviews from previous customers.
MOVESUMMARY.cleaningItem1: All rooms in the residence are vacuumed, mopped, and dusted thoroughly.
MOVESUMMARY.cleaningItem2: All surfaces and cabinets in the kitchen are cleaned, including appliances, both inside and out.
MOVESUMMARY.cleaningItem3: Bathrooms are cleaned and faucets, visible piping, etc. are polished. Degreasing/descaling is done when necessary.

mainTitle_ConfirmationPageItem_7: You have chosen a quality assured service provider.
subtitle_ConfirmationPageItem_9: We have received your booking for move help.
pageDescription_ConfirmationPageItem_10: You will receive an email confirmation shortly with information about what happens next.
fillOutToOrder: Fill in your contact details to book

PUBLIC_OFFERING.intro: At Flyttsmart, we want to make moving easy, that's why we collected the best and most qualified moving firms in Sweden. <0>Read more</0>
PUBLIC_OFFERING.introExternalFlyttsmart: Move help and cleaning with customer satisfaction guarantee

CONFIRMATION.orderMailText: You will receive a confirmation by email shortly, with information about what is happening now.
